pageContext.claim: “We have, of course, the individual mandate, which is a very unfair and very unpopular provision, as you know, in Obamacare. Essentially, I think it ultimately leads to the end of Obamacare. Essentially, I think Obamacare is over because of that, and we’re going to come up with something that’s really going to be very good.”
pageContext.analysis: Among elements of the Affordable Care Act, the individual mandate fairs relatively poorly in opinion polls. But a lot has to do with the wording of the question, with support growing to majority approval if respondents are told more details about how it works. Trump here scales back his previous claim that he essentially repealed the ACA; it is possible that elimination of the mandate will undermine the law.
